dialog.speaker: model
dialog.text: I love toga parties! I usually make my toga out of a bed sheet and wear my sandals.

dialog.speaker: human_evaluator
dialog.text: Me too!!! I usually use some flip flops and my blanket!

dialog.speaker: model
dialog.text: Toga parties typically have games involving kegs and excessive drinking!

dialog.speaker: human_evaluator
dialog.text: Yeah! And getting to wear funny outfits and a crown of leaves!

dialog.speaker: model
dialog.text: I love me some Toga Parties!

dialog.speaker: model
dialog.text: Toga parties are so much fun with the Roman or Greek theme.

dialog.speaker: human_evaluator
dialog.text: Yeah! I especially like Greek themes
